item.title: Numerical methods for PDE
item.description: Outline ODE with initial value problem Reduction of orders Euler method

item.title: Learning physics-informed Neural Networks (PINN)
item.description: My goal is to familiarize myself with physics-informed neural network(PINN), consist of … Having no formal training on solving PDE, the first section will outline basic concepts in solving partial differential equations (PDEs), an example of a PDE, and its closed-form solution. Outline: PDE Closed-formed solution Generating data PINN PDE and the Legendre Differential Equation This section is written with instruction from this introduction by JD Moore. Definition (Power series)
